publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-884 Pauline McNeill on behalf of the Selection Panel: Appointment of the Chair of the Scottish Commission for Human Rights—That the Parliament nominates Professor Alan Miller to Her Majesty The Queen for appointment as Chair of the Scottish Commission for Human Rights.

S3M-884 Pauline McNeill on behalf of the Selection Panel: Appointment of the Chair of the Scottish Commission for Human Rights—That the Parliament nominates Professor Alan Miller to Her Majesty The Queen for appointment as Chair of the Scottish Commission for Human Rights.
S3M-884 Appointment of the Chair of the Scottish Commission for Human Rights (lodged on 20 November 2007) Bill Aitken*, Alasdair Allan*, Hugh O’Donnell*
